ygData.subject: RE: Even more on ebw...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Jeremy Pollack [mailto:jpollack@bigfoot.com] Sent: July 28, 1999 8:32 PM To: shadowknight@onelist.com Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Even more on ebw...
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy Pollack [mailto:jpollack@...]
Sent: July 28, 1999 8:32 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Even more on ebw...


From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>

> You get the hilt by giving Arlena's lute to Grimrot. He also gives you a
> note, which you take to Dekam N'Tazi in Qeynos. Give him the
> note, he gives
> you the mold. Then get some electrum, have a friend enchant it,
> then combine
> the hilt and electrum in the mold.
>
> DV

Okay, I don't THINK anyone said this before. Just what level is Arlena?
Doable with a party of 4-6 lvl 20s (+-2 lvls)? If it is, I'm kicking my
friends into gear and we are going to do this. :)

Thanks,
Jeremy

ps Glad to see this list still going a little at least. :)

I'm thinking it's feasible with a few 22s (give or take a few levels) but
what I wish I knew now is where Arlena spawned.
And as a side note, how can a dark elven sk get to Dekam N'Tazi?
